sentences.en: As a middleman, he has made some money in recent years.
sentences.cn: 他这些年作中间商赚了些钱.

sentences.en: Buy direct from the manufacturer and cut out the middleman .
sentences.cn: 直接从生产厂家购买，绕过中间商。

sentences.en: Buy direct from the manufacturer and cut out the middleman (= avoid using a middleman ) .
sentences.cn: 从厂家直接进货，绕开中间商。

sentences.en: He acted as a middleman in discussions between the two companies.
sentences.cn: 他在两公司的谈判中作中间人.

sentences.en: He acts as a middleman for British companies seeking contracts in the Gulf.
sentences.cn: 他给在海湾地区寻找商机的英国公司当中间人。

sentences.en: I believe that a commission is usually allowed for a middleman.
sentences.cn: 对于代理商,佣金还是要给的吧?

sentences.en: I Believe that a commission is usually allowed for a middleman.
sentences.cn: 对于代理商,我认为佣金还是要给的.

sentences.en: Plays role of the middleman introducing complexity in coordination and project responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 以中间人的角色,引入复杂的协调和项目的责任.

sentences.en: She wants to buy direct from the manufacturer and cut out the middleman.
sentences.cn: 她想避开分销商直接自厂家买进货物.

sentences.en: The investment banker is the middleman between company and investor.
sentences.cn: 投资银行的主要功能就是为公司销售长期证券.

sentences.en: The ordinary characters Middleman who used to receive critics.
sentences.cn: 新时期文学成就之一,就是塑造了大量普通人物形象.

sentences.en: Think of metasearch engines as the middleman between you and a large group of search engines.
sentences.cn: 在你和一大群搜索引擎之间的中间人认为是中间搜索引擎.

sentences.en: We approach the retailers direct, without any middleman.
sentences.cn: 我们直接同零售商接触, 不经任何中间人.

sentences.en: We approach the retailers directly, without any middleman.
sentences.cn: 我们直接和零售商打交道, 不经过任何中间人.

sentences.en: We sell direct from the factory to the customer and cut out the middleman.
sentences.cn: 我们从工厂向顾客直接销售,绕过了中间商.

sentences.en: We will sign an agreement naming you the middleman.
sentences.cn: 我们要签一份协议,请你做中间人.

sentences.en: Why don't they cut out the middleman and let us do it ourselves?
sentences.cn: 他们为什么不甩开中间商，让我们自己干呢？

trans.tran_cn: 中间人，经纪人，调解人，掮客
trans.tran_en: someone who buys things in order to sell them to someone else, or who helps to arrange business deals for other people
